column4: can anyone tell me how to enable a hibernate or at least standby (like in WinXP) mode in warty?
heh - it can be more of a hastle then its worth.
there may be some tweaks/tools out just for that make/model. My sony vaio had a lot of  extra tools
tricks like that is why i wish Gnome had kept 'sawfish' as its window manager. *sigh*
